This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
if(!require(RGoogleAnalytics)){
  install.packages("RGoogleAnalytics")
}
library(RGoogleAnalytics)
library(httpuv)

client.id <- "604463460807-8puhg14pk371kf0shtdcdfjl6ps0iqlk.apps.googleusercontent.com"
client.secret <- "NRwCmQmoeepwX1z8YfweZXxp"

token<- Auth(client.id, client.secret)
ValidateToken(token)

query.list <- Init(start.date = "2016-01-01",
                  end.date = "2016-12-31",
                  dimensions = "ga:month,ga:year",
                  metrics = "ga:itemRevenue",
                  max.results = 10000,
                  sort = "ga:year",
                  table.id = "ga:46730774")

ga.query <- QueryBuilder(query.list)
ga.data <- GetReportData(ga.query, token)
head(ga.data)



```
